info.title: Interactive Voice Response (IVR)
info.description: Create voice menus that guide callers via phone keypad (DTMF) to the desired service.

menus.title: IVR Menus
menus.empty: No IVR menus configured. Create your first menu to guide your callers.

limits.info: Limits: max 10 submenu levels, 12 DTMF entries per menu, timeout 5-30 seconds.

confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this IVR menu?
